projects.title: Resume Parser
bullets: Built a PDF/LaTeX resume parser using Python and regex to extract sections
Improved parsing accuracy by 30% through heuristic rules and unit tests

projects.title: ATS Optimization Tool
bullets: Implemented keyword matching and scoring for job descriptions
Integrated with LaTeX templates to produce one-page resumes

projects.title: Website
bullets: Built a Next.js web app for uploading and processing resumes
Added PDF preview and download functionality

jd: We are hiring a Software Engineer with experience in NLP, Node.js, and LaTeX. Familiarity with PDF parsing and resume/ATS optimization is a plus.
